# Search Companies

# Description

List all company data in Intercom.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Name - The name of the company. This field supports String type input.
* Segment ID - Select the segment from the available drop-down list or enter the segment's ID. This field supports String type input.
* Tag ID - Select the tag from the available drop-down list or enter the tag's ID. This field supports String type input.









* Companies - Automatically generated output variable.
